# Onboarding Checklist - New Collaborators 

If you are interested in becoming an HerbVar member, by contributing data as a Site PI or by joining or proposing a Working Group...

1. Add info to Collaborator Contact Information file
- make sure you have:
  - orcid id
  - github account
1. Get added as “Contributor” to the HerbVar Shared Drive (see if this is still best way)
1. get added to slack
1. get added to herbvar zotero group
1. request access to github 
1. Review Authorship Guidelines
5. Sign Data Use Agreement
